response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your needs perfectly. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth every cent of its $100 price tag. Considering its quality and the satisfaction it can bring to you, I kindly invite you to accept this offer. If you decide not to proceed with this offer, I have another interested party, John, who is willing to purchase the product at the same price. Let's make this happen for you!", "product_price": 100}
